questionText: In 'Breath of the Wild', Link awakens from a 100-year slumber.
What is the name of Link's horse in 'Breath of the Wild'?
The main antagonist in 'Breath of the Wild' is Calamity Ganon.
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', what new ability allows Link to travel through solid surfaces?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Master Sword can run out of energy and become temporarily unusable.
How many Divine Beasts are there in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', Link can create vehicles using the Ultrahand ability.
What is the name of the floating islands in 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', weapons break after extended use.
What is the name of the protagonist in the Legend of Zelda series?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Sheikah Slate can be used to take photographs.
What do you need to collect to increase Link's stamina or heart containers in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', the Depths is an underground area that's the mirror opposite of Hyrule's surface.
What is the name of the dragon that appears in 'Tears of the Kingdom' and causes devastation?
In 'Breath of the Wild', Guardians are ancient machines created by the Sheikah.
What is the name of the sword that seals the darkness in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', Zonai devices use Zonai charges as power sources.
Which ability in 'Tears of the Kingdom' allows Link to reverse the flow of time for objects?
In 'Breath of the Wild', there are 120 shrines to discover.
What special power does Princess Zelda possess in the Zelda series?
In 'Breath of the Wild', each Divine Beast is named after a sage from Ocarina of Time.
Who is the Zora princess in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', the Fuse ability allows Link to combine weapons with various objects.
Which is NOT one of the Dragon spirits in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Yiga Clan was originally part of the Sheikah tribe.
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', what resource do you need to use the Travel Medallion?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Blood Moon restores all defeated enemies to life.
What is the name of the Goron Champion in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', the character Rauru is from the present timeline.
Which ancient tribe built the Sky Islands in 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Old Man on the Great Plateau is actually King Rhoam Bosphoramus Hyrule in disguise.
Which of these is NOT a Champion's ability in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', the character Mineru was one of the original Sages who sealed away Ganondorf.
What mysterious substance corrupts parts of Hyrule in 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', Ancient Arrows can send Guardians to another dimension.
Which divine beast is controlled by Revali in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', Purah is a young girl due to a failed experiment that reversed her age.
Which character builds machines to help Link in 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Deku Tree is located in the Korok Forest.
What is the name of the dragon that drops Dinraal's Scale in 'Breath of the Wild'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Triforce is prominently featured in the main storyline.
Which timeline does 'Breath of the Wild' officially take place in?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', the Demon King's real name is Ganondorf Dragmire.
What is the maximum number of hearts Link can have in 'Breath of the Wild' without DLC?
In 'Breath of the Wild', the Forgotten Temple contains a shrine with the name 'Rona Kachta'.
Which of these abilities can NOT be used while falling in 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
In 'Tears of the Kingdom', the Master Sword is broken into five fragments.
What is the name of the civilization whose ruins appear in both 'Breath of the Wild' and 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
In 'Breath of the Wild', you can get the Master Sword with only 13 hearts.
What is the true identity of the character known as the Demon King in 'Tears of the Kingdom'?
